tool_description:
Source talented software engineers

Search through our database of over 4 million
developers to find the right match for your team.
name: Sourcing.io
title: Sourcing.io

api_list.name: Fetching people by email
api_list.description: The main endpoint is looking people up by their email address.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://community-sourcingio.p.rapidapi.com/v1/people/email/elliott.kember@gmail.com"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "community-sourcingio.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://community-sourcingio.p.rapidapi.com/v1/people/email/{email}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "community-sourcingio.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
